article_title: To Fill Holiday Jobs, Retailers Reach Out Through Social Media
article_text:
Heading into the holiday shopping season, retailers are bombarding customers’ inboxes and Twitter feeds with help-wanted ads in addition to the usual gift ideas and free-shipping offers.

To augment traditional hiring methods, which are failing to produce enough job candidates, retail chains are recruiting through channels usually reserved for promoting products. (See how companies are using social media to find seasonal...

Heading into the holiday shopping season, retailers are bombarding customers’ inboxes and Twitter feeds with help-wanted ads in addition to the usual gift ideas and free-shipping offers.
To augment traditional hiring methods, which are failing to produce enough job candidates, retail chains are recruiting through channels usually reserved for promoting products.
